meanings.sent1: The playground was full of gummers happily chewing their gum.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the gummers because she always has a pack of gum with her.
meanings.sent3: The gummers in the park were having a bubble-blowing contest.
meanings.sent4: The gummers at the party were like a bubblegum army, ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gummers blowing bubbles was etched in his mind.

meanings.sent1: The dentist used gummers to secure the new crown in place.
meanings.sent2: The dental assistant handed the dentist the tube of gummers for the procedure.
meanings.sent3: The patient joked that the gummers made their teeth feel like superheroes.
meanings.sent4: The gummers held the dental work together like a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the gummers in the clinic reminded her of minty freshness.

meanings.definition: A slang term for elderly individuals.
meanings.sent1: The group of gummers gathered at the park bench to chat.
meanings.sent2: The community center hosted a bingo night for the gummers in town.
meanings.sent3: The young boy affectionately called his grandparents the gummers.
meanings.sent4: The gummers shared stories of their youth, painting a vivid picture of the past.
meanings.sent5: The town's annual senior dance was a hit among the gummers.
